name.baseName: Substrate Remediation;In-situ Mulching;Transportation;Transportation of Equipment and Materials to Site
底泥修复;原位覆盖;运输;运输到场的设备与材料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Sources for the production of AC is a fossil anthracite coal-based product from China. Transport from China 20 000 km.
所用生物炭来自中国的无烟煤化石产品，运输距离20000km。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: After investigation, no relevant domestic research literature has been found yet.
经查询，暂未找到国内有相关研究文献

technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical application of this data set is for sustainability analysis and optimization of substrate remediation processes, specifically in-situ mulching involving the use of activated carbon (AC) produced from anthracite coal from China. It is applicable to environmental engineers and project managers who aim to evaluate the ecological impact of transporting equipment and materials, such as biochar, over a long distance (20,000 km) for soil and sediment remediation projects.
此数据集的技术应用是为了分析和优化底泥修复过程的可持续性，具体涉及使用源自中国的无烟煤化石产品制成的生物炭的原位覆盖。它适用于希望评估长距离（20,000公里）运输设备和材料（如生物炭）对土壤和沉积物修复项目生态影响的环境工程师和项目经理。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: . The life cycle inventories, i.e. the aggregated environmental data collected for the modeled system, are derived from three sources. The main source used for the majority of processes is the Ecoinvent 2.2 database.
Process inventory data是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sparrevik, M. et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 45, 4235–4241 (2011).
Sparrevik, M. et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 45, 4235–4241 (2011).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set, users should consider the technological relevance and geographical specificity of the environmental data. It is critical to acknowledge the source of primary data, such as on-site experiments, pilot studies, and supplier information that represent conditions in Southern China. Secondary data is obtained from the Ecoinvent database v2.3 and should be selected for processes with similar geographical origin and technological factors. Data validity begins from the publication time of the referenced literature as no specific start time for data collection is provided.
在使用此LCA数据集时，用户应考虑环境数据的技术相关性和地理特殊性。重要的是要承认一手数据的来源，如代表中国南方条件的现场实验、中试和供应商信息。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，应为地理来源和技术因素相似的过程选择数据。由于参考文献中没有提供具体的数据收集开始时间，因此数据有效性从文献发表时间开始。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
